name: Black_Dwarf_Strike
display_help: Your attack and movement speed has been reduced by the Black Dwarf Strike.

name: Black_Dwarf_Smite
display_help: You feel Disoriented. Your ability to Fly and your attack and movement speed has been reduced by the Black Dwarf Smite.

name: Black_Dwarf_Drain
display_help: The Black Dwarf has Drained your life to heal itself. Your attack and movement speed has been reduced by the Drain.

name: Black_Dwarf_Mire
display_help: The Black Dwarf has Drained your life to buff it's strength. Your attack and movement speed has been reduced by the Mire.

name: Absorption
display_help: Void Hunters naturally absorb energy and negative energy and are resistant to such damage.

name: Umbral_Shield
display_help: This Shield Protects the Void Hunter from all damage types except Psionics.

name: Shadow_Bolt

name: Portal
display_help: Nicti energy entities will continue to spawn from this Shadow Crystal until it is destroyed.

name: Resistance
display_help: Inherent resistance of all inanimate objects. Inanimate objects cannot be moved, knocked back, Healed with normal Heal powers, Disoriented, Held, Slept, Confused, Feared, Taunted or debuffed. They are always Immobilized. Since they have no mind, they inherently take less damage from Psionics.

name: Safe_Zone
display_help: Nictus Entities are safe, as long as they remain in this zone.

name: Expel
display_help: The Demons quickly leave the portal as they teleport through it.

name: Medium_Explosion
display_help: The explosion has left you Disoriented.

name: Dark_Nova_Detonation
display_help: Your attack and movement speed has been reduced by the Dark Nova Detonation.

name: Resistance
display_help: Nictus entities are resistant to energy and negative energy damage.

name: Disjoined
display_help: If the Nictus entities leave the Safe Zone of the Shadow Crystal, they will start to die.

name: Birth_Resistance
display_help: When the Unbound Nictus first emerge from the Shadow Crystal, they are resistant to Disjoined illness for a brief time.

name: Fly
display_help: Nictus Entities can Fly.

name: White_Dwarf_Sublimation
display_help: Through perfect control of your body and energy, you can concentrate for a few moments and heal yourself. This power is only available while in White Dwarf Form. Recharge: Long
